title: Virgin Media O2 owners seal £2bn Netomnia deal in major UK fibre network consolidation
full_text:
Virgin Media O2 owners seal £2bn Netomnia deal in major UK fibre network consolidation. Netomnia could be acquired by Virgin Media O2, but the deal will likely be subject to intense regulatory scrutiny..
  • VMO2 reportedly in the final stages of signing Netomnia acquisition deal
  • Together, they could service around 20 million properties (Openreach services 30m)
  • Continued expansion… [+2280 chars]
